definition: to sweep everything before one/to be invincible (idiom)
actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]
surname Xiang
towards/to face/to turn towards/direction/to support/to side with/shortly before/formerly/always/all along/(suffix) suitable for .../oriented to ...
to drape over one's shoulders/to open/to unroll/to split open/to spread out
extravagant/go with fashion/not
to waste (money)

sentences.english: Sure enough, belts son Bao Arrow extraordinary bravery, skelter.
sentences.chinese: 果然，配帶寶箭的兒子英勇非凡，所向披靡。
曾經所向披靡的第三帝國。

sentences.english: In this materialistic world, where capitalism reigns, literature is facing a imminent crisis.
sentences.chinese: 蓋因西風浩蕩，跨國資本所向披靡，文學面臨危機。

sentences.english: Manchester United in the Champions Cup skelter, no one can be the enemy.
sentences.chinese: 曼聯在冠軍盃中所向披靡，無人能敵。

sentences.english: The Return of the King' is steamrolling its way to Oscar.
sentences.chinese: 《國王歸來》在通往奧斯卡的道路上所向披靡。

sentences.english: Oft did the harvest to their sickle yield.
sentences.chinese: 他們一開鐮就所向披靡。

sentences.english: Later in 2006, he swept presidential elections.
sentences.chinese: 2006年後，他在總統選舉中所向披靡。

sentences.english: The parting of the invincible trio, to some extent, is predestined.
sentences.chinese: 在某種程度上，所向披靡的鐵三角註定要以解散收場。

definition: to be invincible/unrivalled
to triumph in every battle (idiom); invincible/to succeed in every undertaking
to be swept by the wind/to be blown about by the wind/to be routed (in battle etc)
to triumph in every battle and win every fight (idiom); all-conquering/ever victorious/nothing they can't do
pinyin: gong1 wu2 bu4 ke4 , zhan4 wu2 bu4 sheng4

definition: like a hot knife through butter (idiom)/with irresistible force
unstoppable/hard to hold back
to be successful in every endeavor
total annihilation
see 勢不可當|势不可当[shi4 bu4 ke3 dang1]
unsurpassed/unparalleled
no stronghold one cannot overcome (idiom); to conquer every obstacle/nothing one can't do/to carry everything before one
to advance boldly/to push ahead vigorously
to criss-cross/to run unhindered across the whole country
impossible to resist (idiom); an irresistible force
utterly defeated
lit. to cut one's way through thistles and thorns (idiom)/fig. to overcome all obstacles on the way/to break through hardships/to blaze a new trail
